name: Cheese Escape
description:
From the creator of Super Poulet Poulet on the pico-8 comes Cheese Escape.

Cheese Escape is the randomly named platformer project from Matt Riche.  The project started as mere tests of the Godot engine, and rapidly evolved into something playable that ought to be shared!

Play as Christopher, a maniac bent on desecrating Disco-Balls and getting his share of shrimp.  Jump on enemies to defeat them, stringing combos together for point bonuses.  Collect Power-Cherries to gain strength, culminating in becoming the double-jumping Undies-Viking.

Nine stages across three worlds.  Difficulty culminating in '90s levels suffering-- use your infinite continues!  

Killer tunes by Third Hierarchy.

Contact @retsynNL on twitter.
